channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Lebanon, ?light Above The Chaos?
channel.desc: Amid political conflict, economic crises, and religious extremism, the faith and hope of Lebanese Christians calls the universal Church to show solidarity with those in crisis. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Roamin? Catholic
channel.desc: While cleaning out closets, Rob recounts his surfing adventures to Jacek and learns a lesson on humility when his embellished stories lead to understanding the life of Rita Rizzo. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Children's Rosary
channel.desc: Children gather to pray and learn more about the five Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary: The Resurrection, The Ascension, The Descent of the Holy Spirit, The Assumption, and The Coronation of Mary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug inspires you to prepare meals from canned food that everyone will love while explaining that we are all equal in the eyes of our Creator. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: In anticipation of Father?s Day, Jim and Joy read comments and take calls about the importance of fatherhood in today?s society and within the family. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Forgive, With Immacul?e Ilibagiza
channel.desc: There?s no pain like the loss of a child, and Danny and Leila Abdallah lost three of them to a drunk driver. They speak about the aspects of forgiveness and how it?s blessed them. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica lends her insight on the seven gifts at Pentecost. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Glorious Mysteries of the Resurrection, Ascension, Pentecost, Assumption and The Coronation of May help us to receive the graces of faith in the Eternal Life, desire for Heaven, docility to the Holy Spirit, a holy death and the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary Wolfe and Fr. Mark Mary Cristina journey to the Holy Land to visit sites related to the Resurrection. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the life of the Church in the Middle Ages, with particular attention given to the influences of Frankish ruler Charles Martel and King Oswald of Northumbria, as well as the contributions of Ss. Gregory the Great, Augustine of Canterbury, Ethelbert, Bede, Cuthbert, Aidan, Columba and Hilda of Whitby. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Perou : Les Huit Meres
channel.desc: Au d?but des ann?es 1980, une organisation r?volutionnaire communiste appel?e Sendero Luminoso ? Sentier lumineux ? a lanc? une op?ration terroriste brutale dans les r?gions rurales des Andes p?ruviennes, utilisant la terreur sans piti?. L'arm?e envoy?e pour combattre le groupe terroriste a ?galement fait un usage excessif de la force, d?truisant des villages et tuant de nombreux civils innocents. En 2003, ? la fin de 20 ans d'insurrection, plus de 70 000 personnes ?taient mortes ou avaient disparu. Encore aujourd'hui, les traumatismes occasionn?s par ce conflit affectent profond?ment la vie quotidienne du peuple p?ruvien. La Congr?gation des S?urs missionnaires de J?sus Verbe et Victime apporte soins et r?confort ? ces r?gions ?loign?es. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fathers For Good
channel.desc: Fr. Francis Gustilo and Frank Padilla discuss the role of men in their homes, church parishes and communities. Men are called to be leaders and to set examples for family, friends and neighbors. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: In his LIVE, interactive Bible Study, Fr. Mitch continues discussing the woes to the people of Israel in Isaiah 29 and 30 for their lack of trust in the Lord. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Albania, ?metanoia?
channel.desc: The inspiring stories of six nuns who work as missionaries of the faith, bringing back the Gospel to Albania, which suffered from a fanatic, atheist, communist dictatorships. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Psalm 118:22 speaks of the stone the builders rejecting has become the cornerstone. Mother Angelica explains that through Jesus? death, resurrection and ascension, He became the cornerstone of the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Dr. Marion De La Torre joins Jim and Joy to speak about his book ?The Screwtape Letters and the Catechism,? tying together the significant resources for growing spiritual courage. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: St. Robert Bellarmine was one of Catholicism?s leading voices for reform and renewal, at a time when the Protestant revolt threatened to tear it apart. As a doctor of the Church, he was first and foremost, a teacher. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Liberia: Rimes Et Rythmes Du Liberia
channel.desc: Sur la c?te ouest de l'Afrique se trouve le petit pays du Liberia. Avec une population d'environ 3 millions d'habitants, il est un des pays les plus anciens d'Afrique et l'un des plus pauvres du monde. La vie politique lib?rienne est rest?e relativement calme jusqu'au coup d'?tat militaire de 1980, suivi par une guerre civile qui a fait plus de 200 000. Les Lib?riens l?ont qualifi?e de leur troisi?me guerre mondiale. Selon Human Rights Watch, plus de 15 000 enfants soldats ont combattu. Des pr?tres ont ?t? assassin?s, tandis que l'infrastructure de l'?glise a ?t? an?antie. L'ancien pr?sident du Liberia, Charles Taylor, a ?t? condamn? ? 50 ans de r?clusion par un tribunal pour crimes de guerre appuy? par l'ONU. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch welcomes Dr. Matthew Bunson to discuss his new biography of Pope Leo XIV and the insight he gained from his research into the first American Pope. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord revisit the extraordinary life of St. Catherine of Siena: mystic, and Doctor of the Church, whose works have influenced the faithful of the entire world. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Debbie Cowden and her panel of moms, who are also accomplished authors, discuss how beautiful imagery and age-appropriate storytelling can help parents build faith at home. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Daniel Klimek explains near death experiences and talks about their similarities to Marian Apparitions. We also hear from author Ted Flynn about the Apparition at Garabandal. (30 minutes).

channel.title: They Might Be Saints Bishop Frederic Baraga
channel.desc: Trekking across Michigan?s wilderness earned him the nickname ?the Snowshoe Priest,? but his heroic virtue bringing the Gospel to Native Americans and immigrant miners may earn Bishop Frederic Baraga sainthood. (30 minutes).

channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about literal interpretation of Old Testament figures within a historical context, tithing for Catholics, and keeping the Faith when going to college. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Kansas Royals? Mike Sweeney shares how he?s batted for multiple major league teams in his career, and why he feels safe at ?home? in his Catholic faith. Hosted by Bob Dolan. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Mother describes the fruits and gifts of the Holy Spirit and how they can help us better understand the Third Person of the Trinity. (60 minutes).

channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Jackie Angel returns to discuss Scripture, its place in our life, and how Scripture memorization can be a fun activity the whole family can enjoy together. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Canada: Preserving The Life Of A Nation
channel.desc: An EWTN News original documentary explores the alarming rise and lack of restrictions on abortion and euthanasia in Canada. Following the country?s recent federal election, we hear from those who have experienced the impact firsthand. EWTN Correspondent Mark Irons traveled to Canada and found that preserving this beautiful country starts with protecting the most vulnerable. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Walking Through Time: Catholic London
channel.desc: Joanna walks to Chelsea in the footsteps of St. Thomas More, where his country house was located and his old mulberry tree still flourishes on the grounds of what is today a Catholic seminary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Fire Of Your Love
channel.desc: In this stirring music special featuring traditional and fresh new works, members of the Cor Unum Chorale lead the congregation of St. John the Guardian of Our Lady Parish in Clinton, Massachusetts in song. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Life isn't just for rat-race drudgery and cheap thrills. How to get more satisfaction out of life by understanding one's place in the larger picture. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: The most visited Marian shrine in the world is at Guadalupe, and ?Miracle Hunter? Michael O?Neill is there to investigate how the mysterious image emblazoned on St. Juan Diego?s tilma has inspired millions of believers. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Holy Mass On The Feast Of St. Anthony Of Padua
channel.desc: From the Shrine of Saint Anthony in Padua, Italy. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Oldest Gospel In The World
channel.desc: The fascinating story of the Hanna Papyrus, an artifact 18 centuries old containing the text of two Gospels. Learn the mysteries of its discovery, its history through the ages and the steps being taken to preserve it. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Priesthood Of Jesus Christ
channel.desc: Fr. Miller briefly discusses the aspects of the priesthood which will be discussed in future episodes. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Thomas Petri shares his call to religious life, subsequent ordination, and what he considers to be the most important rungs in our spiritual ladder to union with God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: In a country with approximately 830 different languages, Christians in Papua New Guinea face unique challenges adapting to rapid social developments in the modern information age. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: The second luminous mystery unfolds at the wedding feast of Cana. By turning water into wine, Jesus shows he?ll offer his own blood on the cross and in the Eucharist, and will become the Eternal Bridegroom of his people. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: The life of St. Francis of Assisi from care-free youth to his conversion and radical embracement of poverty for the love of God. Animated. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: When the Donut Shop kids accidentally skip an important part of their play about the Mass, Fr. Joe saves the day by stepping in to explain the final steps of Mass so that everyone leaves ready to share the Faith with the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about Pentecost and how the Holy Spirit dwells within us. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Champions Of Faith
channel.desc: Featuring Major League Baseball?s biggest stars, discover the intersection of sports and Faith with those whose careers have been strengthened and magnified by their Faith in God. (70 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Pier Giorgio Frassati Get To Know Him
channel.desc: A brief introduction to Blessed Pier Giorgio Frassati: a young, joyful man, whose devotion and charity towards the poor caused Pope Francis to encourage young people to look up to him as an example of holiness. (20 minutes).
